p: Aulicine and 3-O-methyl-epimacowine are crinine-type alkaloids and have been isolated from Hippeastrum aulicum Herb. and Hippeastrum calyptratum Herb. [ 110, 111]. Evidente and Kornienko [ 97] reported on the anticancer properties of these crinine-type alkaloids. This would justify the anti-lung cancer activity of crude Bacillus safensis endophyte extracts. Different cancer cell lines can be used to determine the anticancer activity of crude Pseudomonas cichorii endophyte extracts.
